title: Fire and Ice
description: Dillon lane had given up on love and had remained single for years, now and was looking forward to taking her first vacation since her children left home. She never expected to fall in love again, especially with a vampire and Nicholas Logan had spent centuries walking this earth alone, given up on finding his soul mate until he found Dillon Lane. Dillon also had no idea that lying in her own cellular makeup lay the power to bring life back into vampireâ€™s with just her touch but would they survive to give this super natural love affair a fighting chance
author: Connie Ruth Vejar
